Resolved Question Show me another » Working at a fast food restaurant? To most restaurants higher 15 year old kids? What type of stuff do you do there because making food? Cleaning the grease from parking areas? Is making/preparing the food hard? Would it be good to work in the summer? maybe part time during school time? 4 years ago Report Abuse by Tammie H Member since: January 06, 2009 Total points: 535 (Level 2) Add Contact Block
Best Answer - Chosen by Asker depending on the state, the minimum age to work in a restaurant is different here it is 16. The manager and other staff teach you all you need to know about preparing the food and other duties you are supposed to do. No it isn't hard, but it does take a little bit to where you remember what condiments go on which burger etc. without having to ask or look at a manual. It is a good place to begin work experience. 4 years ago Report Abuse Asker's Rating: Asker's Comment: Thanks Action Bar: 0 stars - mark this as Interesting! Email Comment ( 0 ) Save Add to My Yahoo!
